entrant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who takes part in a competition
entrant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who has recently started studying at university, or working
entrant.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a company that starts to sell goods or services in a market where they have not sold them before, or one of these goods or services
entrant.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Some foreign entrants have recently come into the local market.
Any new entrant is a threat in such a competitive industry.
